question:
The IBM GRAF has been in the news lately. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. It is a weather forecasting tool.
  2. It will make use of supercomputing for the functioning.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The IBM GRAF is a weather forecasting tool for use in India. It has a very high resolution of 3km. Even the IMD has a lower resolution of 12km. The model will be able to provide forecasts every 3 days or weekly or fortnightly. Â Statement 2 is correct: The IBM GRAF (Global High Resolution Atmospheric Forecasting System) uses supercomputing for its functioning. It will collect data from a variety of sources like automatic sensors, sensors on buoys, user apps, etc. to make the forecasts. The forecasts will be provided free of cost for various users.
